content: I agree with almost all of the points mentioned in your article. I am turning 23years old now yet most of the things you mentioned actually makes sense even at this young age. Btw the fact about going going back to bed at midnight instead of pulling all nighters is absolutely valid because you reach a certain level of maturity at the right time to understand that it is sometimes much more productive to follow a regular sleep schedule rather than going for an erratic ones where you might achieve a state of nirvana/fulfillment at those late hours but wake up in the morning with a crazy hangover regretting every moment of it :D
